trigger: Delayed administration of rBPI21 also affected LPS - mediated activation of the nuclear factor , NF-kappa B . Two to 4 h following LPS addition to endothelial cells , when NF-kappa B was already activated , addition of rBPI21 resulted in marked reduction of NF-kappa B detectable at 4 or 6 h .

Delayed administration of rBPI21 also affected LPS - mediated activation of the nuclear factor , NF-kappa B . Two to 4 h following LPS addition to endothelial cells , when NF-kappa B was already activated , addition of rBPI21 resulted in marked reduction of NF-kappa B detectable at 4 or 6 h .
These results indicate that endothelial activation requires continuous presence of LPS , and rBPI21 acts to reverse LPS - mediated endothelial activation by interrupting the on-going LPS signal .
These results indicate that endothelial activation requires continuous presence of LPS , and rBPI21 acts to reverse LPS - mediated endothelial activation by interrupting the on-going LPS signal .
